title: Unit tests to validate SOLR xml responses using XSD/DTD
description: According to SOLR-17, we should add some regression test cases (or perhaps modify the existing ones) for the XML response writer to ensure that any changes in its structure do not break the intended schema. This should help to contain people like Chris who keep trying to change it.
